text: Robert Frank Krueger is Hathaway Distinguished Professor of Clinical Psychology and Distinguished McKnight University Professor in the Department of Psychology at the University of Minnesota. He is known for his research on personality psychology and psychopathology. He is the co-editor-in-chief of the Journal of Personality Disorders. He received the American Psychological Association's Award for Distinguished Scientific Early Career Contributions to Psychology in 2005. ==References== ==External links== *Faculty page * Category:Living people Category:University of Wisconsin-Madison alumni Category:American psychologists Category:Personality psychologists Category:University of Minnesota faculty Category:Psychopathologists Category:Academic journal editors Category:Clinical psychologists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Robert F. Krueger
